import React, { useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ButtonGroup, } from 'react-bootstrap' //distructure match from props const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { // Get the prouductId from url/id, use props.match here // const product = products.find((product) => product._id === match.params.id) // Let's fetch data return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
